item.title: Testing Org-Mode
item.description: New line... Here is the content for my wonderful post. I really hope I can use EMACS as a blogging platform... I still need to copy some of the shortcodes into YASnippet so I can use them in EMACS posts... I guess I can go ahead and try them in this post. ABORT HELLO! HELLO! HELLO! HELLO! What is the Problem?! title Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
